route_home.title: Park
route_home.intro: We aim to develop a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) application designed to manage parking facilities for municipalities and corporations. The application will offer a comprehensive set of features to streamline parking operations, improve user experience, and optimize the management of parking infrastructure.

integration.title: Integration with Parking Equipment
integration.description: The application will interface with parking area and garage equipment to enable automated entry and exit of vehicles. This will include the verification of payments to ensure smooth and efficient vehicle access.

management.title: Parking Infrastructure Management
management.description: The application will allow for the management of parking property assets, including: Inventory tracking of equipment and resources. Scheduling and tracking of maintenance tasks. Defect detection, management, and reporting to maintain operational efficiency.

analytics.title: Analytics and Reporting
analytics.description: The application will offer detailed analytics and reporting features to provide insights into parking utilization, financial performance, and operational metrics, helping stakeholders make data-driven decisions.

charging.title: Management of E-Charging Infrastructure
charging.description: The platform will support the management of electric vehicle (EV) charging stations, enabling monitoring, maintenance, and reporting related to e-charging infrastructure.

deployment.title: Global Deployment
deployment.description: The SaaS application will be designed for global scalability, allowing deployment across different geographic regions and supporting various regulatory requirements, currencies, and languages.
